ravecore 0.0.0.9007
  • Reference

Align images using 'AFNI'

Source: R/workflow-afni_3dallineate.R
cmd_run_3dAllineate.Rd

This is a legacy script and possibly contain errors. Please use cmd_run_ants_coreg for faster and stable implementation instead.

Usage

cmd_run_3dAllineate(
  subject,
  mri_path,
  ct_path,
  overwrite = FALSE,
  command_path = NULL,
  dry_run = FALSE,
  verbose = dry_run
)

Arguments

subject

subject ID

ct_path, mri_path

absolute paths to 'CT' and 'MR' image files

overwrite

whether to overwrite existing files

command_path

path to 'AFNI' home

dry_run

dry-run flag

verbose

whether to print out script
